phrases: He fits snugly in my arms.
Wh-Wh-What do you think you are doing?!
It does not matter if I can carry him in my arms.
It does not matter if he is shorter than me.
Hurry up and be night time already...
That is not what I meant!
Coming to the beach during summer vacation should be about love and youth!
You are still trying to hide it at this point?
Come on, just admit it to me and I will help you out.
What do you mean by that?
Hey, boys and girls, please listen up for a sec!
Okay, let us try to give Risa and Otani-kun some alone time today.
For the sake of Risa realizing her one-sided love, we all need to do what we can!
Wh-Wh-Wh-Wh-What the heck are you saying?!
Oh, so you are finally going to confess to Otani-kun, are you?
I told you, everyone already knows.
The only one who has not realized it is Otani himself.
You have got it all wrong!
I could not find you guys.
I was looking for you for ages...
Right, Suzuki-kun, let us have a race from the beach to the open sea.
They are all watching my every move.
What is got you so stiff?
You sure are casual, completely oblivious to other people's problems!
I have no idea what you are talking about.
You guys go and have fun.
Risa will get bored all alone.
Otani-kun, could you stay with her?
I will be fine by myself!
We cannot just leave you on your own.
My main objective for the day is to catch some rays anyway.
Well in that case, stay with Risa and you guys can both get a tan.
I will be fine on my own.
Why do you have a problem with that?
Besides, even if you tan that skinny body of yours, you will not look any better.
If you are got this much time to spare, why do not you go swim?
Oh, so it is like that, huh?
When I become a lawyer, I am going to sue you!
But I wanted to swim with Nobu-chan...
Who asked you to get him to sue you?!
I told you to confess to him!
Ya want to have some fun together?
You really thought someone was trying to pick you up?
I did not say that was for you.
I am going to drink'them both.
Why did not you put it over there, then?!
You are the one who started it.
I am just returning the favor.
Are you just being quiet or are you feeling weak?
It is because I have been wounded.
Should I get you some pain killers or something?
What if I happened to accidentally fall for you...
Do not say such disgusting things.
Is not there anything better we can talk about?
With someone like you, there probably is not!
What is that supposed to mean?
Do not get your hopes up about ever finding a boyfriend, amazon.
I am just a giant amazon!
You said a mean thing like that?
She is the one who is always calling me a midget!
A girl in love will always be emotional!
There is someone you like, Koizumi?
You are denser than I thought.
I never thought it would end up like this.
Let us all go get snow cones.
We are going to an Umibouzu concert, are not we?
I forgot about the pain ages ago.
Hey... what was all that about earlier?
The summer sun was just too much for me.
So who is this guy you like Koizumi?
You are going to leave me out?
The guy you like is shorter than you, right?
That is why you cried when I called you an amazon.
How can you let stuff like that worry you?
You have your own charm, Koizumi.
Of course I mind, being the only one who does not know.
This is just the type of guy he is...
You will find out soon enough.
But this is the type of girl I am...
What do you mean, soon enough?
Hey, I really do care, you know.
I do not know if it will go smoothly...
The concert is about to start.
As punishment for making me cry, take a picture with me.
Still, I never thought he would be this slow on the uptake.
He is been asking me, Who does Koizumi like?
Over and over since we got back from the beach.
Risa, do not forget that Otani-kun is popular.
This summer vacation is your chance!
Once summer is over, we have got the school trip and a ton of events coming up.
If you keep procrastinating, you will have to deal with a ton of rivals going after Otani-kun.
I will help you, but you need to do your best too, okay?
It is completely useless using a subtle approach with him.
You just have to do it directly.
There is no way I can do that!
It will never work if you cannot even say that.
There is something I just have to say to you.
Basically, you need to get him alone first.
It is not like it would be your first time alone with Otani-kun.
Up till now, we have jsut been together as All Hanshin-Kyojin.
How can we get a romantic mood going now?
Impossible or not, just do it!
Are you okay with being All-Kyojin forever?
I have said a lot of bad things up till now, but, to be honest...
What were you talking about so secretively?
I am not going to say right.
There is something I just have to say to you.
There is something I have got to say to you too.
So, what did you want to tell me?
Who is it that you like?
Everyone keeps talking about it behind my back.
It is really getting on my nerves.
Why am I the only one who does not know?
It is completely useless using a subtle approach with him.
That is because you are the one I like!
How could I possibly say that?
Hey, I am talking to you.
Hey, did you hear what I just said, Koizumi?
But I have to do it over summer.
If I do not tell him now...
Just be brave and do it!
I have said a lot of bad things up till now, but, to be honest
I-I have said a lot of bad things up till now, but, to be honest...
What are you trying to say?
You are not just being emotional.
You are being downright suspicious now.
You were shouting during the game too.
Let me tell you, we won today because of me.
You would not know since you were not watching at all, though.
I was watching you the whole time.
Hey, if something is really troubling you, you can always talk to me about it.
I might be able to help, you know.
Or do you really consider me that untrustworthy?
Why are you acting so distant, then?
Are not we All Hanshin-Kyojin partners?
Why are you clutching at your head?
Do you really like him that much?
What kind of guy is he?
He is an idiot... but he is a good guy.
He is shorter than me, but he is so sweet that I do not care.
Do not tell me the reason you have been coming to watch basketball...
It is that freshman, Yamamoto, right?
If it is someone shorter than you, and he is on the basketball team, it has to be Yamamoto.
I feel like I am going to cry.
Man, Otani is seriously slow, and hopeless to boot.
It is not like it matters, anyway.
I totally forgot for a second there.
A fountain you can put on your bathroom wall!
I cannot wait for tonight's bath!
She is wanted one for a long time now.
I really do not understand her taste.
Maybe he is calling to wish you a happy birthday.
I sent a message and told him it is your birthday.
Wh-What did you do that for?!
Hurry up and answer, or he will hang up.
Uh, I guess I am free.
What is that supposed to mean?
Well, meet me on the roof of the big building next to the train station at 7pm.
Oh, and wear what you wore when we went to the festival, okay?
Why are we meeting in a place like this?
And what was that about the festival?
Well, it is not nothing big, but...
It is my most treasured possession.
But I thought you said you would never give this away...
Well, if I am giving it to a fan like you, I think God will forgive me.
As a treat, I am giving this to you too.
But these are all just extras.
It looks like it is dark enough.
I found this place last year.
Are you feeling a bit better now?
You have been all frustrated and weird lately.
I thought watching the fireworks would cheer you up.
It is appropriate when watching fireworks.
But fine feathers do not make fine birds, right?
If it is now, I think I can say it.
I confessed to the guy I like, but...
